div.p: South Gray Schools are comprised of Copeland USD 476 and Montezuma USD 371. They include an elementary and Jr. high in Copeland, KS and an elementary and high school in Montezuma, KS.

p.a: Kansas Family Guide to Continuous Learning

div.h2:
"Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world."
-Nelson Mandela
